"Xitrae": "Thanks for coming. Let me introduce myself again."
"I'm Xitrae. I'm from the Central City Supply Corps, and I'm in charge of managing supplies to support combat operations."
"Supply lines are the backbone of any fighting force! Our job is to keep our combat teams supplied, no matter where they are!"
"Problem is, enemy activity has really stepped up lately. They're blocking our convoys and chasing our procurement squads away."
"Would you help secure our supply lines by clearing those enemies out?"
"First up... Enemies marked with a special symbol have been particularly active lately, so start by going after them."
"If you do really well, I might just have a reward for you!"
"Alright then, I look forward to working with you!"
"Supply lines are the backbone of any fighting force! We won't let a few enemies get in our way!"
"There are kind of a lot of enemies right now, though..."

"Oh hey, you're back.
Yeah, this is exactly what I wanted!"
"You've been a huge help. These should add a bit of color to people's meals."
"As thanks, I'll give you some of my signature dish, Balloonimix. You should give it a try!"
"Go on, eat up! You'll need plenty of energy out there!"
"...Soooooo, how about you go take down some symbol-marked Enhanced Enemies next?"
"We don't get much combat training in the Supply Corps, so I'm terrible at aiming for Enhancers."
"I'll just leave it to you. Good luck!"
"Welcome back! You're not hurt, are you?"
"You've really helped me out on this one. Thanks a ton."
"It'll be way easier to get supplies through with those enemies out of the way. We should be able to ship to anywhere now."
"Here! It's my thanks for everything you've done!"
"I've been able to scrape some other items together here, so if there's anything you need, just let me know."
"And if enemy numbers start building up again, you can go stamp 'em back out!"
"Welcome back! Alright, I guess you're wondering what's up."
"Long story short, an ARKS recon team in Western Aelio reported seeing a lot of symbol-marked enemies there."
"I hear a battle group is being put together to go deal with them. Since you seem to be kind of an expert, I was wondering if you could go help them out?"
"They'll put out an announcement before the operation begins, so that'll be your cue to get ready."
"Oh, almost forgot. I heard there's some unusual enemies mixed in with them, so watch yourself out there."
"I'm counting on you to get this done. Good luck!"
